About

You explain your workflow, I automate it where possible. You provide feedback until we get it right. Simple as that.

Scripts and Apps written in: Google Apps Script, React, Angular, Django, Python, Javascript, C#/ .NET Core

Welcome to Jekyll!

Google Apps Script Estimator

Google Apps Script web app for employees to create estimates using an existing spreadsheet. Created to address the issues of employees creating copies of the spreadsheet and employees breaking the spreadsheet.

Created with React, Google Apps Script, Google Sheets

  • Client: Ardmor Inc.
  • Date: February 2020
  • Service: Web Development

Timecard App

Google Apps Script web app timecards. Interface created for employees with very limited computer knowledge. Easy onboarding and offboarding of employees. Solution for an old paper based system.

Created with Jquery, Google Apps Script, Google Sheets

  • Client: Hanford Rice Bowl
  • Date: January 2019
  • Service: Web Development

Ordering Widget

Systematized the ordering of party trays where originally prices were made up on the spot. Helps customers plan party trays per person rather than calling in and receiving vague answers. Embedded into their business website.

Created with Angular 6, Firebase, Firebase Real Time Database, Invoices sent via Send Grid email API, Angular Material for styling

  • Client: Hanford Rice Bowl
  • Date: January 2019
  • Service: Web Development

Sales Data Parser

Python script with pandas to clean data exported as plain text. Plain text documents were irregularly formatted and the script had to take into account the irregularities. Data was displayed on Google Data Studio and used to make business decisions.

  • Client: Start Bootstrap
  • Date: April 2014
  • Service: Hanford Rice Bowl
